name: The Mother Tree Sees All
text:
1: At the beginning of the Duel, add 1 "Sunavalon Dryatrentiay" to your Extra Deck and if there are two or less "Sunseed Genius Loci" in your Deck, add 0–3 "Sunseed Genius Loci" so that it contains 3 copies.
2: During the End Phase, if you took battle or effect damage this turn, gain 500 LP.
